stories.title: Ethical Questions About Charitable Giving [audio + transcript]
Francis Collins will step down as head of the National Institutes of Health

stories.text:
@everyone

Hi there !

A bit out of the ordinary post, this one… It’s about Real Life (I’ll explain later what that is :smile: ).

So.. in RL I’m an online teacher, and my students are going through a certain trajectory. At some stage they do some kind of ‘internship’. That means they create a website or application for a non-profit organization.

My question to you all is :

Do you happen to know a *non-profit organization* that could use a brand new *website *(or application).

The only thing we ask is to have a meeting with us, discussing what you want the website to look like and perhaps a meeting once every month for 1 hour.

Please ask around and contact me !

Thanks in advance,

Alex

alexicoo@gmail.com
stories.title: Do you know a non-profit organization that is in need of a website?
Escher Circuits: Using Vision to Perform Computation

stories.text: We're in the AWS Oregon datacenter and are facing over 2 minute execution times just for a simple OPTIONS CORS call to our app that is usually instant.  Obviously this is terrible especially given how AWS Gateway times out after only 30 seconds. Support is pretending like it's not happening - anyone else out there struggling today (2021-10-05)?
stories.title: Anyone else having problems with AWS Lambda timeouts?
